channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 21:08 Air alarm in Zvenigorod district to care for further reports.
item.description: 🔴 21:08 Air alarm in Zvenigorod district to care for further reports.#Zvenigorod_ district This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
